results.name: a(n) = n XOR sigma(n), where sigma(n) is the number of divisors of n, A000203.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384

Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: (Scheme) (define (A169813 n) (A003987bi n (A000203 n))) ;; Where A003987bi implements the bitwise-XOR, A003987 and code for A000203 can be found under that entry. - _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 25 2017
